name: excel-jira-sql-processor
description: Process Excel files, validate with SQL Server, and integrate with JIRA

scripts.clear:servers: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; $pids = @(); $pids += (Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.Name -eq 'node.exe' -and ($_.CommandLine -match 'server.js' -or $_.CommandLine -match 'start-app-simple.js' -or $_.CommandLine -match 'ui\server.js') } | Select-Object -Expand ProcessId); for ($p=3000; $p -le 3010; $p++) { $conns = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $p -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($conns) { $pids += ($conns | Select-Object -Expand OwningProcess) } }; $pids = $pids | Sort-Object -Unique; foreach ($pid in $pids) { try { Write-Host "Killing PID $pid"; Stop-Process -Id $pid -Force } catch {} }"
